item.title: Installation of Ubuntu in dual boot with El Capitan
item.description: I bought my 24’ iMac in March 2009. The latest OSX Version it can support is El Capitan. Althought it is still a very capable machine with its 8 Gb of RAM and its new SSD, the lack of OSX update makes its support of new iCloud features more and more limited. And I can’t convert it to a dev machine as the last version of .net core it supports is 2.

item.title: How This Site Is Built
item.description: Goal: to explain how this site is built To build this web site I use Hugo. Hugo is a static site generator built in go. It is free, easy to understand and highly configurable. In addition to the egine you can download templates to have quickly a look’n feel that suits your need. The posts are written in markdown which is very handy to perform quick formatting. As all the content is text based, it is easy to manage versions, to collaborate and to transfer the site from one machine to another.
